body:
Testing a new deployment option this build. The Windows package is now significantly smaller, <20MB as opposed to 60MB. This may or may not completely break everything, so let me know if you have issues launching it. 

- Fixed Draug drones being idiots
- Fixed some major map loading bugs
- Added/fixed descriptions for nearly everything
- Added new maps for custom games
- Added icons for displaying allowed gamemodes in maps
- Added map load generation filters
- Added ore generation for all new maps
- Added map symmetry filter
- Added UI scale option
- Added bloom option
- Added new background to zone selection
- Added pan limit in tech tree/zone view
- Removed quit button to fit application guidelines [iOS]
- Improved map generation dialog
- Improved filter options
- New SDL-based desktop backend: may fix some bugs/improve game feel [Windows]
name: v4 Build 83 - Beta
